Auth.forgot-password-desc: Enter your email below to recover your account
Auth.activate-desc: Enter your new password below to activate your account
Auth.login-desc: Enter your username and password to login to your account

Error.regex-password: Password must 12 characters length contain at least 1 Uppercase letter, 1 Lowercase letter, 1 symbol, and 1 number
Error.missmatch-password: Retype password must be the same with password field
